Description: You make a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. Make a melee attack, doing bug damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is 15 or more, the target has disadvantage on its next attack.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
